mapper.update: update microscope_tracking set start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, booking_pid = #{bookingPid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, microscope_id = #{microscopeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, microscope = #{microscope,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, start_time, end_time, booking_pid, microscope_id, microscope from microscope_tracking
select id, start_time, end_time, booking_pid, microscope_id, microscope from microscope_tracking where booking_pid = #{bookingPid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and end_time is null limit 1
